metadata.title: CVE-2024-46826 linux
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:  ELF: fix kernel.randomize_va_space double read  ELF loader uses "randomize_va_space" twice. It is sysctl and can change at any moment, so 2 loads could see 2 different values in theory with unpredictable consequences.  Issue exactly one load for consistent value across one exec.
